name: Global uniques
uniques: Triggers a [Terraforming Tips] event <upon discovering [Terraforming] technology>
Provides [1] [Temperature] <when number of [Atmosphere] is greater than [Atmosphere Best Status]>
Provides [1] [Biomass] <for every [100] [Biomass]> <when number of [Oxygen] is between [1800] and [3200]>
Provides [1] [Biomass] <for every [100] [Biomass]> <when number of [Water] is between [3600] and [4000]>
Provides [1] [Biomass] <for every [100] [Biomass]> <when number of [Temperature] is between [2780] and [3230]>
Provides [1] [Biomass] <for every [100] [Biomass]> <when number of [Atmosphere] is between [780] and [1213]>
[+10]% growth [in all cities] <when number of [Oxygen] is equal to [Oxygen Best Status]>
[+10]% growth [in all cities] <when number of [Water] is equal to [Water Best Status]>
[+10]% growth [in all cities] <when number of [Temperature] is equal to [Temperature Best Status]>
[+10]% growth [in all cities] <when number of [Atmosphere] is equal to [Atmosphere Best Status]>
